mapper.sql: COURIER_NUMBER, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_NAME, SHOP_NUMBER, CREATE_DATE, ADDRESS, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS, GOODS_COST, ORDER_NUMBER, NUMBER_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, IS_PUSHED, STU_NUM, ONE_CODE, PROVINCE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SOURCE_IMPORT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SOURCE_IMPORT (COURIER_NUMBER, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_NAME, SHOP_NUMBER, CREATE_DATE, ADDRESS, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS, GOODS_COST, ORDER_NUMBER, NUMBER_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, IS_PUSHED, STU_NUM, ONE_CODE, PROVINCE ) values (#{courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courierCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isPushed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update SOURCE_IMPORT
COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_NUMBER = #{record.shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

ONE_CODE = #{record.oneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SOURCE_IMPORT set COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NUMBER = #{record.shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSEE = #{record.addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COURIER_COMPANY = #{record.courierCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS = #{record.goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_COST = #{record.goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_TYPE = #{record.numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_PUSHED = #{record.isPushed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_NUM = #{record.stuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONE_CODE = #{record.oneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SOURCE_IMPORT
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_NUMBER = #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESSEE = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURIER_COMPANY = #{courierCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBER_TYPE = #{numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_PUSHED = #{isPushed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_NUM = #{stuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONE_CODE = #{oneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where COURIER_NUMBER = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SOURCE_IMPORT set CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NUMBER = #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSEE = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COURIER_COMPANY = #{courierCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_COST = #{goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_TYPE = #{numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_PUSHED = #{isPushed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_NUM = #{stuNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONE_CODE = #{oneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COURIER_NUMBER = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SOURCE_IMPORT
and COURIER_NUMBER like '%${str3}%'
and CTM_BAR_CODE like '%${str4}%'
and CTM_NAME like '%${str5}%'
and ORDER_NUMBER like '%${str6}%'
and STU_NUM in (select stu_num from staff_user where stu_name like '%${str7}%')
and (CREATE_TIME >= #{date1} or IS_PUSHED=0)
select COURIER_NUMBER, CTM_BAR_CODE from SOURCE_IMPORT where CREATE_TIME >= #{date} and IS_PUSHED = 0
